Class FileRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.nnsoft.shs.http.BaseRequestHandler
      org.nnsoft.shs.demo.FileRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestHandler
public final class FileRequestHandler
extends BaseRequestHandler

A simple request handler that serves static files. NOTE the current handler doesn't check any content negotiation.
